Gallery.SubTitleBeauty: Your skin has memory, ten, twenty, thirty years from now, will show the results of how it was treated today, treat her with respect and gentleness, treat her with
Gallery.SubTitleHealth: It is essential to prioritize our health and define actions that help keep us healthy, both mentally and physically, take action and learn about our products.

Promotion.TextComplementaryBesanaBeauty: Start taking care of your skin and delays the first signs of aging.

Publicity.Title: Anti-Aging pack
Publicity.Subtitle: day and night cream
Publicity.DescriptionFirstProduct: Moisturizes, treats and protects your skin without greasy feeling; perfect under your makeup or anytime.
Publicity.DescriptionSecondProduct: Wake up with softer, renewed and hydrated skin, your friends will want to know your secret.

Details.Desc: This product contains a combination of hydrating, antioxidant, and anti-wrinkle ingredients that work together to improve the appearance of skin, smooth fine lines, and reduce the signs of aging, providing a more youthful, rejuvenated appearance with continued use.

Company.Description: We are a company that seeks to improve the quality of life of people both physically and economically, we are committed to each of our affiliates through the work and experience of professionals in the network marketing industry who are responsible for reinforcing your knowledge and providing you with materials and tools you need for goals, objectives and the desired lifestyle. We are working in different cities of the country, ready to act where they need us.
Company.VisionText: Become a leading company in the industry, in addition to being able to provide our partners and customers with innovative products that at the same time provide a benefit.
Company.MisionText: Provide our partners with a better quality of life, both physical and economic, and also reinforce their knowledge so that they achieve the desired objectives.
Company.PhilosophyText: Well-being, commitment and creation of opportunities.

ReturnPolicys.Title: RETURN POLICY
ReturnPolicys.C1: Thank you for your purchase. We hope you are happy with your purchase. However, if you are not completely satisfied with your purchase for any reason, you may return it to us for a full refund, store credit, or an exchange. Please see below for more information on our return policy.
ReturnPolicys.C2: All returns must be made within thirty (30) days of the purchase date. We will not ask for your reason for a return request and you are able to keep the product! No need to ship back the product.
ReturnPolicys.C3: Once you request a return we will grant you a refund. You do not need to ship back the product.
ReturnPolicys.C4: After requesting a return, we will process your return or exchange. Please allow at least three (3) days from the receipt of your item to process your return or exchange. Refunds may take 1-2 billing cycles to appear on your credit card statement, depending on your credit card company. We will notify you by email when your return has been processed.
ReturnPolicys.C5: The product will be shipped within 3-5 business days from the initial date of purchase. Once the product is shipped, you will receive a tracking email with proof of purchase.
ReturnPolicys.C6: If you have any questions concerning our return or delivery policy, please contact us at: (888) 294-2286 or info@besanaglobal.com

PrivacyPolicys.C52: We will not sell or share your data with other third parties, except in the following cases:
PrivacyPolicys.I52: 2. If it is required for any legal proceeding;

PrivacyPolicys.T6: HOW LONG WE STORE PERSONAL DATA
PrivacyPolicys.C6: User data will be stored for Six months. You will be notified if your data is kept for longer than this period.
PrivacyPolicys.T7: HOY WE PROTECT YOUR PERSONAL DATA
PrivacyPolicys.C71: In order to protect your security, we use the strongest available browser encryption and store all of our data on servers in secure facilities. All data is only accessible to our employees. Our employees are bound by strict connfidentiality agreements and a breach of this agreement would result in the employee's termination.
PrivacyPolicys.C72: While we take all reasonable precautions to ensure that user data is secure and that users are protected, there always remains the risk of harm. The Internet as a whole can be insecure at times and therefore we are unable to guarantee the security of user data beyond what is reasonably practical.
PrivacyPolicys.C8: We do not knowingly collect or use personal data from children under 13 years of age. If we learn that we have collected personal data from a child under 13 years of age, the personal data will be deleted as soon as possible. If a child under 13 years of age has provided us with personal data their parent or guardian may contact our privacy officer.
PrivacyPolicys.T9: HOW TO ACCESS, MODIFY, DELETE, OR CHALLENGE THE DATA COLLECTED
PrivacyPolicys.C9: If you would like to know if we have collected your personal data, how we have used your personal data, if we have disclosed your personal data and to who we disclosed your personal data, or if you would like your data to be deleted or modified in any way, please contact our privacy officer here:
PrivacyPolicys.C10: Do Not Track (DNT) is a privacy preference that you can set in certain web browsers. We do not track the users of our Site over time and across third party websites and therefore do not respond to browser-initiated DNT signals.
PrivacyPolicys.C11: A cookie is a small file, stored on a user's hard drive by a website. Its purpose is to collect data relating to the user's browsing habits. You can choose to be notified each time a cookie is transmitted. You can also choose to disable cookies entirely in your internet browser, but this may decrease the quality of your user experience.
PrivacyPolicys.C1101: We use the following types of cookies on our Site:
PrivacyPolicys.C1102: Functional cookies are used to remember the selections you make on our Site so that your selections are saved for your next visits.
PrivacyPolicys.C12: This Privacy Policy may be amended from time to time in order to maintain compliance with the law and to reflect any changes to our data collection process. When we amend this Privacy Policy we will update the Effective Date at the top of this Privacy Policy. We recommend that our users periodically review our Privacy Policy to ensure that they are notified of any updates. If necessary, we may notify users by email of changes to this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicys.C13: If you have any questions, concerns or complaints, you can contact our privacy officer, Marivel Rivera, at:
